alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morrow; Wheeler (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 6:12PM PDT until May 20 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Morrow County in northeastern Oregon... Northeastern Wheeler County in northeastern Oregon... Northwestern Grant County in central Oregon... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 612 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Monument, or 32 miles south of Heppner, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Morrow, northeastern Wheeler and northwestern Grant Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
